sdata.j: ↑咳↑↓せき↓↑止↑↓ど↓めとアス|ピリ|ンが↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓です。
sdata.e: You should buy some cough medicine and aspirin.

sdata.e: Bill was single until he tied the knot last week.
